attributes.action: Not sell the UK nuclear power industry to France but to invest in UK industry & UK ownership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a tax payers we object to the sale of the UK nuclear power industry to a French government owned company. The UK would be better served by investing in the existing UK industry to develop,  build & operate a new generation of UK nuclear power stations. This would recover its skills, invest in UK jobs, our future & security of strategic power supply. We ask that our government act as we desire &  to not sell our share holding in the UK industry to EDF.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/UKNuclear/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
